onboarding.title: Global Presence
onboarding.subTitle: Now enjoy double advantage. Shop your favourite Vestige products and remain updated with news and offers of Vestige at a single place.

onboarding.title: Wish you Wellth
onboarding.subTitle: Your Vestige business offers you multiple benefits such as Travel Fund, Car Fund, House Fund and more. Get ahead in Vestige business and avail the benefits.

onboarding.title: Think Global
onboarding.subTitle: Connectivity is vital for us. Vestige keeps you digitally connected with your business, network and success graph 24x7.

mobileNumberUpdate.mobileNumberUpdateHeading:
Update your
registered mobile number
through below options
mobileNumberUpdate.optionViaMobileDescription: You can update your number via OTP verification on your old & new mobile number. This process usually takes only a few minutes to complete.

Verify Your Current 
Registered Mobile Number & Update 
New Mobile Number

You have successfully 
updated your registered mobile number.

errorMessage.enterOtp: Please enter 4 digit OTP for both numbers.
